description.en:
The "Foodie" gold medal salesperson vs. "God of Cooking" Physics Professor and little puppy. A different kind of elder sister-younger brother love relationship. Sweetness strikes! That glutton next door, after eating so much of my food, how are you going to pay me? Money? I don't want money, I just want you.

---
Qiaofeng has always been single, and there are three problems that he cannot overcome: the first, being extremely handsome; the second, being fantastically rich; and the third, owning faultlessly high IQ. Legend has it that Qiaofeng has a very abnormal IQ test paper. And anyone who wants to be his girlfriend must get at least 60 points. However, perfectly avoiding all the correct answers and marking 0 in ten minutes, she actually becomes Qiaofeng's girlfriend… how does this happen…

---
**Original Manhua:** [BiliBili](https://manga.bilibili.com/detail/mc27858), [Kuaikan](https://www.kuaikanmanhua.com/web/topic/6359/)

**Official English Translations:** [BiliBili](https://www.bilibilicomics.com/detail/mc336), [INKR](https://inkr.com/ik-title-642), [WebComics](http://webcomicsapp.com/comic/5f30c1278c252b6c451fe567), [WeComics](https://wecomics.com/comic/index/id/1108?id=1108)
*All English Platforms have different translations.*

[Official Korean Translation / 한국어](https://page.kakao.com/home/%EC%98%86%EC%A7%91%EB%82%A8%EC%9E%90/55608872)
